participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, with a passion for knowledge and nature.
participant_1.background: i am a museum tour guide. i'm partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea. i have a big library at home. i grow roses in my garden.

participant_2.name: Rohan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and free-spirited, with a love for music and sports.
participant_2.background: my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool.

content.text: Yo! I like to go to the park and drink tea
Hey, listen. I love roses, I love roses
